thread.title: S Immo says Immofinanz share deal 'perhaps' step in right direction

title: S Immo says Immofinanz share deal 'perhaps' step in right direction
text:
April 18, 2018 / 3:46 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago S Immo says Immofinanz share deal 'perhaps' step in right direction Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
VIENNA, April 18 (Reuters) - The chief executive of Austrian property group S Immo favours consolidation in his home market and believes rival Immofinanz’s deal to acquire 29 percent of his company might be positive, he said on Wednesday after the deal was announced. 
“I have never made a secret of the fact that I view consolidation in the Austrian market favourably. Perhaps a step in the right direction has been taken here,” Chief Executive Ernst Vejdovszky said in a statement. (Reporting by Alexandra Schwarz-Goerlich, Writing by Francois Murphy; Editing by Michael Shields)
